name: cloud_workstation
title: Cloud Workstation
summary: This app sets up a cloud workstation which you can access by running the applet with the --ssh or --allow-ssh flags

inputSpec.name: max_session_length
inputSpec.label: Maximum Session Length (suffixes allowed: s, m, h, d, w, M, y)
inputSpec.help: The maximum length of time to keep the workstation running.  Value should include units of either s, m, h, d, w, M, y for seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, or years respectively.

inputSpec.name: fids
inputSpec.label: Files
inputSpec.help: An optional list of files to download to the cloud workstation on startup.

inputSpec.name: snapshot
inputSpec.label: Snapshot
inputSpec.help: An optional snapshot file to restore the workstation environment.

details.whatsNew:
* 2.1.2: Update dx-create-snapshot help message. Remove extension from user-defined snapshot name. Fix snapshot creation to include only changed files.
* 2.1.1: Fixed saved paths in dx-create-snapshot and added warning for deprecating dx-snapshot.
* 2.1.0: Removed from aws:cn-north-1 region
* 2.0.1: Added warning in job log if input snapshot may not be compatible with the running cloud workstation.
* 2.0.0: Updated cloud workstation OS to Ubuntu 20.04.
* 1.3.1: Enabled in Europe (London) region.
* 1.3.0: Jobs started from Cloud workstation are started in detached mode by default.
* 1.2.1:Added Cloud workstation to London region. Pre-installed pkg-config package.
*1.2.0: Cloud workstation updated to py3 AEE. Changed default instances to v2 instances.
* 1.1.0: Updating cloud workstation to using Ubuntu 16.04 and adding azure:westeurope region.
